TEXT.TITLE: DIGILOG <DIOL> GETS BELLSOUTH <BSC> ORDERS
TEXT.BODY: Digilog Inc said it has received 669,000 dlrs in orders from BellSouth Corp for network monitoring and management equipment that is to be delivered this month. Reuter
